title: Drawing, "Two Sleeping Pigs", August 1844
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper left:  1 dark organge purple wiht broad masses of orange light / 2 light fleecy stringy clouds, yellow and light / 3 red sun ray; and again at upper right: Aug 1844

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Sep 1844
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of cloud studies with a setting sun surrounded by rays.

Verso:  Two sleeping pigs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Sleeping Pigs", August 1844.
August 1844. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1392.
